page.title: 12ANIMALS IN OUR AREA_2
page.content: There are lots of animals in Ludworth. You often see hares running about the fields.Hares are frightful animals,you usually see them on dark nights.If you shine a light in a hare's eyes it would stand still.You usually see mole hills in Ludworth but you dont see a lot of moles.Moles are black they have pink noses and black eyes.Moles come out at night.There are lots of ladybirds in Ludworth,they have seven black spots on their backs and the rest of their bodies are red.You only see a few hedgehogs around Ludworth.Hedgehogs have spines all over their backs.Frogs are green and slimey they have four legs they can stay out of water for about 1 to 2 hours.There are foxes around Ludworth, and these are sometimes hunted by the Shadforth Hunt.
